Pharr.Oratory Athenaeum for University Prepara:
Oratory Athenæum for University Preparation is a private, Roman Catholic high school in Pharr, Texas. It is located in the Roman Catholic Diocese of Brownsville.


== Background ==
The Oratory Athenæum for University Preparation was established in 1998 as an extension of The Pharr Oratory School System of St.
